effect.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

effect.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival pasa a estar Envenenado.

description.en: Its venom sacs produce a fluid that this Pokémon then heats up with the flame in its tail. This process creates Salandit's poisonous gas.
